arts.ttl: Torino in Parma looking for three in a row
arts.sum: After a run of five consecutive defeats away against Parma, Torino have lost just one of their last four games at the Tardini in Serie A (W2 D1); indeed, after their 3-0 success in January 2021, the Granata could win two matches in a row at the Ducali`s home in the top-flight for the first time in their history. After victories against Milan (2-1 at home) and Monza (2-0 away), Torino could win three games in a row in a single Serie A season for the first time since February-March 2019.
Just three points separate Serie A’s top three sides ahead of week 28 and Alex Wrigley has predictions for all 10 games in the Italian top flight.

Parma are coming off a 1-0 defeat to Udinese last weekend, which was also their fourth in a row on the road. Torino will be aiming for their third win in a row after defeating Monza 2-0 last Sunday, ...
